https://tmrev.io/movie/743114-Checosamanca 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cK3JM6OSQgjFucGU3fvH4gcx0sC.jpg From a Calabrian river to a night in Catania where stray dogs roam the city aimlessly: between these two extremes "full of emptiness" is built Checosamanca , a collective work, born with the intention of talking about the present, preferring the action to the easy complaint about the absence of the state and of politics. Checosamanca
